DOC.brief_summary: To assess effect MK0493 body weight , blood pressure , mood , appetite .
DOC.brief_title: Study Safety , Tolerability Efficacy MK0493 Obese Patients ( 0493-008 ) ( COMPLETED )
DOC.criteria: Patient 21 65 year Patient able read understand complete study questionnaire Patient pregnant breastfeeding plan become pregnant duration study poststudy followup period Patient history significant psychiatric disorder ( major depression , bipolar disorder , bulimia , anorexia nervosa Patient HIV positive determine medical history Patient undergone surgical treatment obesity Patient plan consume two 8 ounce glass grapefruit juice per day study Patient participate another clinical study involve investigational drug ) within 3 month prior Visit 1 Patient currently heavy consumer alcohol ( > 2 drink per day > 14 drink per week [ 1 drink define 2 oz hard alcohol , 5 oz wine , 12 oz beer ] , us ( include recreational use ) illicit drug , history drug alcohol abuse
